662140.name: Tower!2011:SE - Toronto [CYYZ] Airport
662140.description:
Toronto Pearson International Airport [CYYZ] for TOWER!2011:SE

Toronto Pearson International Airport is an international airport serving the city of Toronto, Ontario, Canada, and its metropolitan are with 8.7 million people.
The airport is located 14 miles far from Downtown. The Airport is named after Lester B. Pearson, Nobel Prize Laureate and 14th Prime Minister of Canada.
Pearson Airport is the largest and the busiest airport in Canada. In 2015, it handled more the 41 million passengers and 443,154 aircraft.
It`s the world`s 33rd busiest airport by total passenger traffic and 15th busiest airport by flights.
Pearson is the main hub for Air Canada and also WestJet and FedEx..
